doc.name: WaitingTime
doc.description: This actor measures the time that events at one input have to wait for events at another. Specifically, there will be one output event for each waiter input event. But the output event is delayed until the next arrival of an event at waitee. When one or more events arrive at waitee, then all events that have arrived at waiter since the last waitee (or since the start of the execution) trigger an output. The value of each output is the time that the waiter event waited for waitee. The inputs have undeclared type, so anything is acceptable. The output is always a DoubleToken.
doc.author: Lukito Muliadi, Edward A Lee
doc.port: The output, which is always a DoubleToken representing the that a waiter waited for an input at the waitee input.
